title: Sega Genisis 32x Emulator - With Sonic Collection
description:
Fusion v3.64

Fusion (formerly known as "Kega II" and Kega Fusion) is a Sega SG1000, SC3000, Master System, Game Gear, Genesis/Megadrive, SegaCD/MegaCD and 32X emulator for Win9x/ME/2000/XP

Just Unzip Fusion V3.64.zip to Folder Run Fusion.exe
Easy to use you can find all the Sonic games in the ROMs folder.
ROMs Included:

Sonic The Hedgehog
Sonic The Hedgehog 2
Sonic The Hedgehog 3
Sonic and Knuckles
Sonic Compilation
Sonic 3D Blast
Sonic Spinball
